subject: Advance planning for levy of fees (toll) on sections / newly constructed bridges / bypasses under Public Funded projects
text: HT<y 7cnv 7ruarjf %feran<ot PHONE 91-11-25074100 /25074200 (7r waav 3r <roTarif vT4) Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 Extn_ 2223/2318/2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 SECTOR-10, DWARKA NEW DELHI-110045 NHAI/ 13013/22/ 02-03/ CMD-CO/ DGR 21.4.03 Circular NO: NHAL/COMMERCIAL OPERATION/16 Sub: Advance_Planning for_Levy ef_Fees_(ToLl}_ on Sections newly constructed bridges_ bypasses under Public Funded projects: This supercedes Circular No. NHIAI/ Commercial Operation 5, dated 16.9.02. As you are aware, Levy %f Fee (Toll) commencing with opening of sections bypasses bridges to the   traffic, needs advance planning: This requires timely submission of proposal for issuance of fee notification by the Govt. of India Accordingly, it has been decided that: i) Information as format enclosed at Annexure A must be submitted at least 150 days prior to the likely date of completion of the project; by concerned PIU CMU to concered Technical Division at HQ. ii) Concerned Technical Division, at least 120 days prior to the likely date of   completion of the project, shall ensure that; the information received, are sent to Commercial Operation Section in CM Division with their clear recommendation iii) Following should also be enclosed along with the information in the format given in Annexure A: Specimen as per Annexure (1) A draft notification "B" (2) A Location map "C (3) An Area map D" (4) Layout _ of Plaza Lanes "E" {5] Sectional Elevation of lanes F" and toll booths Contd 2/ 7-Ineelamiarlvance nlanning ciniclar doc per plan plaza
